########### CMakeMaker autogenerated file ###########
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)

find_package(GTest)


set(cpp_files
  ./source/cmake_writer.cc
  ./source/main.cc
  ./source/repo_searcher.cc
  ./source/settings_parser.cc
  ./source/test_target_writer.cc
  ./source/cmake_writer.h
  ./source/repo_searcher.h
  ./source/settings_parser.h
  ./source/test_target_writer.h
  ./test/test_test_target_writer.h
)

source_group(source FILES
  ./source/cmake_writer.cc
  ./source/main.cc
  ./source/repo_searcher.cc
  ./source/settings_parser.cc
  ./source/test_target_writer.cc
  ./source/cmake_writer.h
  ./source/repo_searcher.h
  ./source/settings_parser.h
  ./source/test_target_writer.h
)

source_group(test FILES
  ./test/test_test_target_writer.h
)

add_executable(cmakemaker ${cpp_files})

include_directories(cmakemaker
  ./source
  ./test
  ${GTEST_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

target_link_libraries(cmakemaker
  ${GTEST_LIBRARIES}
)
